data.name: Full Width play.eslgaming.com
data.description:
play.eslgaming.com is not very responsive and the info is inside width-limited blocks.

I'm just setting it to 100% with some minor adjustments.

data.name: Quizlet Black Theme [V1.0]
data.description: Is Quizlet's own dark theme not dark enough for you? Try this style! This style makes Quizlet even darker! For optimal use, turn on Quizlet's own dark theme while using this style! Want more dark or black themes? Visit my profile!
